channel.title: Another Direction - Andrew Young
channel.description:
I used vocal chops in various parts of the track. It's got a retro feel to it, with instruments such as Reflex being used. I also decided to include a saxophone in this track.
https://soundcloud.com/andrewyoung300/another-direction
